flawed_nl_solution:
The bus started with 50 people - 15 who got off at the first stop = <<50-15=35>>35 people on the bus.
At the second stop, 35 people on the bus - 8 who got off = <<35-8=23>>23 people.
Then there were 23 people + 2 who got on = <<23+2=25>>25 people on the bus.
At the third stop, 25 people on the bus - 4 who got off = <<25-4=21>>21 people on the bus.
Then there were 21 people on the bus + 3 who got on = <<21+3=24>>24 people on the bus.
#### 24

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 23. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
